AppPush.Title: Welcome to Collapse Launcher
AppPush.Message: You can now install or migrate your existing game here. For more information/guides, please visit: https://github.com/neon-nyan/CollapseLauncher/Wiki

AppPush.Title: Announcement: You are using Preview build
AppPush.Message:
Hi there, this app is still in preview phase. You might expect some bugs here and there. If you find any bugs or issues, please open an issue on GitHub at:
https://github.com/neon-nyan/CollapseLauncher/issues

AppPush.Title: Warning: Changes on Build: 1.0.20.3 Preview
AppPush.Message:
Regarding to changes on update mechanism for 1.0.20.3 build, you may expect that the update after 1.0.20.3 build would not work.
We recommend you to reinstall your launcher using the latest version to mitigate this.

Thank you.

RegionPush.Title: Announcement: Recent Updates Regarding to v2.7 Update delay
RegionPush.Message:
In regard of official statement, v2.7 was delayed due to "project progress". Compensation will be issued to every players in every week.
The compensation includes: 400 Primogems, 1 Fragile Resin, 7 Hero's Wits, 16 Mystic Enhancement Ores, and 120000 Mora.
This compensation will be issued from May 11th, 2022 until further announcement.
For more information, please visit HoYoLab or In-Game Announcement.
